TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MarshalAsAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MarshalAsAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MarshalAsAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示如何在 Managed 和 Unmanaged 程式碼之間封送處理資料。

span.span: Indicates how to marshal the data between managed and unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至參數、 欄位或傳回值。You can apply this attribute to parameters, fields, or return values. 每個資料類型封送處理行為的預設值，這個屬性是選擇性的。This attribute is optional, as each data type has a default marshaling behavior. 指定的型別可以多個類型封送處理時，才需要這個屬性。This attribute is only necessary when a given type can be marshaled to multiple types. 比方說，您可以字串封送處理至 unmanaged 程式碼，可能是，則，則，或。For example, you can marshal a string to unmanaged code as either a , a , a , or a . 根據預設，通用語言執行平台封送處理字串參數，做為COM 方法。By default, the common language runtime marshals a string parameter as a to COM methods. 您可以套用到個別的欄位或參數，讓封送處理為該特定的字串屬性而不是。You can apply the attribute to an individual field or parameter to cause that particular string to be marshaled as a instead of a . [Tlbexp.exe （類型程式庫匯出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)傳遞您 common language runtime 的封送處理喜好設定。The [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) passes your marshaling preferences to the common language runtime. 某些參數和傳回值有不同的預設封送處理行為時搭配使用 COM interop 或平台叫用。Some parameters and return values have different default marshaling behavior when used with COM interop or platform invoke. 根據預設，執行階段封送處理字串參數 （和實值型別中的欄位） 做為至平台叫用方法或函式。By default, the runtime marshals a string parameter (and fields in a value type) as a to a platform invoke method or function. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設封送處理行為](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-behavior.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling Behavior](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-behavior.md). 在大部分情況下，屬性只會識別在未受管理的資料使用的格式列舉型別，如下列 C# 簽章中所示：In most cases, the attribute simply identifies the format of the unmanaged data using the enumeration, as shown in the following C# signature: [!code-csharp[system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/Signature1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/Signature1.vb#2)] 某些列舉型別成員需要其他資訊。Some enumeration members require additional information. 例如，需要其他資訊時是。For example, additional information is needed when the is . 如何使用這個屬性，陣列的完整說明，請參閱[預設封送處理陣列](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For a complete description of how to use this attribute with arrays, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md). [Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)也將此屬性套用至參數、 欄位和傳回值，表示輸入的型別程式庫中的資料類型不是對應的 managed 的資料類型的預設類型。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) also applies this attribute to parameters, fields, and return values to indicate that the data type in the input type library is not the default type for the corresponding managed data type. Tlbimp.exe 一律會套用要和為了清楚起見，無論何種輸入型別程式庫中所指定類型的類型。Tlbimp.exe always applies the to and types for clarity, regardless of the type specified in the input type library. > [!NOTE] > 不支援封送處理泛型型別。The does not support marshaling of generic types. ## Examples 下列範例會套用欄位、 方法參數和方法傳回 managed 型別值。The following example applies the to a field, a method parameter, and a method return value in a managed type. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/marshalasattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/marshalasattribute.vb#1)] 下列範例會套用屬性的屬性：The following example applies the attribute to a property: [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/Signature1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/Signature1.vb#3)]

span.span: Type Library Exporter (Tlbexp.exe)
Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe)

summary.span: 使用指定的 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會採用基礎的 16 位元帶正負號的整數，表示每個列舉成員。This constructor takes an underlying 16-bit signed integer that represents each enumeration member. [Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)會使用這個建構函式。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) uses this constructor.

span.span: Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)

param.span: 要將資料封送處理成的值。

span.span: The value the data is to be marshaled as.

summary.span: 使用指定的 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 成員，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對可讀取的程式碼較不容易出錯，一律使用這個建構函式。For readable code that is less prone to error, always use this constructor.

summary.span: 指定 Unmanaged 或 的元素型別。

span.span: Specifies the element type of the unmanaged or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定此參數的值從列舉型別來指定陣列的項目類型。You can set this parameter to a value from the enumeration to specify the type of the array's elements. 如果未指定類型，則會使用對應到 managed 的陣列的項目類型的未受管理的預設類型。If a type is not specified, the default unmanaged type corresponding to the managed array's element type is used. 例如， `ArraySubType` for `LPWStr` COM 中的陣列是。For example, the `ArraySubType` for a `LPWStr` array in COM is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設封送處理陣列](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指定 COM 所使用之 Unmanaged 屬性的參數索引。

span.span: Specifies the parameter index of the unmanaged attribute used by COM.

summary.span: 提供其他資訊給自訂封送處理器。

span.span: Provides additional information to a custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自訂封送處理器時，此欄位是選擇性的。This field is optional when using a custom marshaler. 您可以設定此欄位設為字串，提供給自訂封送處理器的其他資訊。You can set this field to a string that supplies additional information to a custom marshaler. 例如，相同的封送處理器可用來提供幾個的包裝函式，會使用 cookie 來指出特定的包裝函式。For example, the same marshaler can be used to provide a number of wrappers, where the cookie is used to indicate the specific wrapper.

summary.span: 指定自訂封送處理器的完整名稱。

span.span: Specifies the fully qualified name of a custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用或欄位指定自訂封送處理器屬性之參數的型別、 欄位，或傳回型別。You can use either the or field specify a custom marshaler type for the attributed parameter, field, or return type. 欄位可讓您指定字串，表示自訂封送處理器的完整的名稱。The field enables you to specify a string representing the fully qualified name of a custom marshaler. 它可用於晚期繫結參考，但小於會優先比來指定自訂封送處理器。It is useful for late-bound references, but is less preferred than for specifying a custom marshaler. 如需有關建立及使用自訂封送處理器的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂封送處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079)。For additional information about creating and using custom marshalers, see [Custom Marshaling](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079).

span.span: Implements as a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用或欄位來指定自訂封送處理器屬性之參數的型別、 欄位，或傳回型別。You can use either the or field to specify a custom marshaler type for the attributed parameter, field, or return type. 欄位可讓您更輕鬆的使用方式的藉由縮短的語法。The field allows easier usage of by shortening the syntax. 在下列範例中，第一行會代表使用語法而第二行則代表語法使用。In the following example, the first line represents syntax using and the second line represents syntax using . ``` [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalType = "Assembly, NameSpace.TypeName")] ``` ``` [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalTypeRef = typeof(NameSpace.TypeName)] ``` 您可以設定物件使用`typeof`在 C#`GetType`在 Visual Basic 中，或`typeid`c + + 中。You can set a object using `typeof` in C#, `GetType` in Visual Basic, or `typeid` in C++. 如需有關建立及使用自訂封送處理器的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂封送處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079)。For additional information about creating and using custom marshalers, see [Custom Marshaling](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079).

span.span: Indicates the element type of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此欄位設定值，以從列舉型別來指定安全陣列的項目類型。You can set this field to a value from the enumeration to specify the type of the safe array's elements. 如果未指定類型，則會使用受管理的項目類型的預設型別 （如果傳遞的 variant 型別）。If a type is not specified, the managed element type's default type (if passed as a VARIANT) is used. 例如， `SafeArraySubType` for `int` COM 中的陣列是。For example, the `SafeArraySubType` for an `int` array in COM is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設封送處理陣列](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指示 的使用者定義的元素型別。

span.span: Indicates the user-defined element type of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化這個欄位與您的自訂類型，若要啟用的項目`SAFEARRAY`封送處理成功。Initialize this field with your custom type to enable the elements of the `SAFEARRAY` to be marshaled successfully. 這個欄位才有需要時可能， ，或。This field is only needed when the is either , , or . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設封送處理陣列](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指示固定長度陣列中的元素數目或要匯出之字串中的字元數目 (非位元組)。

span.span: Indicates the number of elements in the fixed-length array or the number of characters (not bytes) in a string to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此為必要的欄位並的成員列舉型別。This field is required for the and members of the enumeration. 範圍限於 0x1FFFFFFF 中繼資料的壓縮的格式，因為允許的值是 (> = 0 和 < = 0x1FFFFFFF)。Because the compressed format of the metadata is limited to 0x1FFFFFFF, the range of allowed values for are (>= 0 and <= 0x1FFFFFFF). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設封送處理陣列](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指示哪一個以零起始的參數含有陣列元素的計數，類似 COM 中的 。

span.span: Indicates the zero-based parameter that contains the count of array elements, similar to in COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位支援 managed 至 unmanaged 和非受控至 managed 呼叫。The field supports managed-to-unmanaged and unmanaged-to-managed calls. 它並沒有任何影響，在 managed 程式碼會呼叫 COM 物件上。It does not have any effect on managed code that calls COM objects. 根據 managed 的類型和套用至它的屬性，則可以傳遞為安全陣列或 C 樣式陣列的陣列。Depending on the managed type and the attributes applied to it, the array can be passed as a safe array or C-style array. 當陣列會傳遞做為 C 樣式陣列時，封送處理器無法判斷陣列的大小。When arrays are passed as C-style arrays, the marshaler cannot determine the size of the array. 因此，若要將 managed 的陣列傳遞給 unmanaged 函式或方法，您必須提供兩個引數：Therefore, to pass an managed array to an unmanaged function or method, you must provide two arguments: - 陣列、 參考或值所定義。The array, defined by reference or value. - 參考或值所定義的陣列大小。The array size, defined by reference or value. 陣列大小參數的以零為起始的索引定義使用欄位。The zero-based index of the array size parameter is defined by using the field. 如果您同時指定並使用欄位，欄位的值的總和會產生大小總計。If you specify both and with a field, the sum of the fields' values produces a size total. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設封送處理陣列](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For more information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md). ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/CPP/marshalas.sizeparamindex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/CS/marshalas.sizeparamindex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/VB/marshalas.sizeparamindex.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As UnmanagedType

summary.span: 取得資料要封送處理成的 值。

span.span: Gets the value the data is to be marshaled as.

value.span: 資料要封送處理成的 值。

span.span: The value the data is to be marshaled as.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值可用於搭配來表示類型方式應該封送處理以 managed 和 unmanaged 程式碼之間。This value is used with to indicate how types should be marshaled between managed and unmanaged code. 在某些情況下，您可以使用此欄位與特定`UnmanagedType`列舉型別成員。In some cases, you can use this field with certain `UnmanagedType` enumeration members. 針對和，您必須使用額外的具名的參數。For and , you must use additional named parameters.
